name: La Casa Del Mofongo
address: 1447 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

reviews.text: Hoy estuve por all√°, soy de las que le gusta ir a diferentes restaurantes y comer bueno.  Por fin este restaurante me dio lo que quer√≠a. Wow que delicioso ü§§ ese Mofongo y la bebida. Le doy 10 de 10. E comido en muchos restaurantes y este me hizo sentir que estaba en otro mundo. Que sabor m√°s delicioso. Me qued√© sin palabras para describir. Recomiendo el mofongo de pulpo üêô que delicia. No temas si quieres elegir algo diferente a lo tradicional. El de pulpo te tapar√° la boca ü§£üò±ü§§ü§§üòçüòç la bebida 10 de 10.
El mejor camarofongo y con el mejor sabor!ü§©üôèüëç‚Ä¶
Loud music üé∂ be ready and a little expensive
Buen servicio

Ordenamos guandules y enviaron habichuelas, ordenamos chicharr√≥n de pollo y enviaron pollo frito. Adem√°s tampoco pusieron limon para el chicharr√≥n de pollo. El servicio por tel√©fono es p√©simo, jam√°s considerar√© pedir aqu√≠ de nuevo

Always enjoy stopping by the mofongo house, good music, good food and cold beers! This time a tried a mixed drink and had mixed feelings on it so i won't add that one in truly.

Had the chicharron de pollo sin hueso natural(bo breading) maduros on the side the rest of the table ordered different dishes but we all enjoyed everything!.

The music is always banging the ambient and the people. i've been lucky every time i go its been an incredible visit for me!

Def a stop to make in the heights whenever I'm in NYC!

The food was ok for the price. However the mofongo was meh. My husband and his family said it could have been better. That‚Äôs coming from locals from Santo Domingo. They did their best with 12 birthdays at the same time.
good food but service person took a looong time, no bueno eso

La Casa del Mofongo has really good food, no doubt‚Äîbut the portions are small for the price. It‚Äôs definitely on the expensive side for what you get. That said, the service is friendly and the atmosphere is nice, which makes the experience more enjoyable.

If you don‚Äôt mind paying a little extra for a taste of Dominican flavor, it‚Äôs worth trying‚Äîbut don‚Äôt expect large portions.

Great food and music!!!
Great place to sit at the bar
Will come back for the soup!!
Horrible. El mofongo fue de lo peor. Queso que intentaron derretir y no se derriti√≥, fr√≠o y grueso. Jam√°s volver√≠a.
Vinimos de california a probarla muy buena buen servicio nos atendi√≥ luz la mejorr ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©
The food was amazing!!! The people amazing!! The atmosphere reminds me of DR zona colonial
Muy mal servicio no me gust√≥ aparte saco dinero del cajero y mira como salen
Seems like man servers are better than women servers in this place. Even my wife said it. Men servers are genuine, elegance, and well driven.

Love this place! Went with some friends recently and we all had a good time. I ordered the shrimp ceviche mofongo and it was amazing! Also had the passion fruit margaritas and it was strong and delicious. Service was great and they had a DJ so it was definitely a vibe. Would definitely go back.
Un plato de mofongo cuesta 50 dolares: platanos por 50 dolares.. very expensive y el lugar no se ve grandioso
Pretty cool place to eat & drink @

Our "new server" was great. We knew he was new, he took our order and repeated it. The bartender bought us our drinks and asked if we placed our order we said yes. After that everything was downhill. The food was bland and they forgot the easiest thing 2 sides of rice and beans. When we told them after a while maybe 30 minutes they decided to blame the "new guy" so I asked where he was as he disappeared after taking iur order. He was sent to so something else. I then asked so who was taking his spot? No answer we asked to remove the rice and pay to leave. They wanted to get people and point fingers. Our server the "new guy" did just fine it's the other senior people who pulled him off his duty that are to blame and to tell your customers he is new is low. He did what he was told. Next time a newer team member is training someone should be with them and in the case they make a mistake it happens that should not be the first thing management says, make it right and stop looking to blame. Had they apologized and went to get our rice and beans it would've been ok but horrible customer recovery skills by your senior staff. Menu is overpriced for quality.

First of we went recommended, total disappointment, La casa del mofongo and they did not have Tri fongo!!!! beef stew was hard and cold, mofongo was dry only good thing was the garlic oil sauce they give you to make it moist then it was eatable, and the waitress with her up most attitude like not humble nor thank you when i mentioned her we went recommended with a 10 star rating! Rude ppl no customer etiquette at all I think they do not know the meaning of it. My bill was over 200 charging regular price when some plates were order from the special menu, for that never again total disappointment.

TIENEN QUE VAJAR ESO PRECIO ESTAN DEMASIDO ALTO UN MOFONGO QUE EN  OTRO LUGAR TE CUESTA 35 DOLLAR HAY ME QUITARON 51 DOLLAR Y A MI AMIGO TAMBI√âN LE HICIERON LO MISMO TIENEN QUE TRABAJAR ESO PRECIO EN REALIDA PoRQUE SE VE CADA VEZ MAS VACIO EL NEGOCIO Y ES POR LA MISMA RAZON SOY TAXISTA Y CUANDO VOY A IR PARA ALLA Y LE DIGO AMIS AMIGO ME DICEN TU ERE LOCO HAY ESTAN MUY CARO LOS PRECIO.

Desde el comienzo hasta el final este lugar no tiene buen servicio, la comida s√∫per mala y sin sabor los empleados no tienen ning√∫n tipo de delicadeza para atender c√≥mo se merece el cliente, tienen que entender que si no hay clientes no cobran, no tienen trabajo tampoco, no recomiendo este lugar para nada poco profesionalismo, fue mi segunda vez por que quise darle una segunda oportunidad por que la primera fue mala, pero esta fue peor , hasta para pagar tuve que esperar que la empleada terminara de comer para pagar, dios m√≠o incre√≠ble. üëéüëéüëéüëé HORRIBLE  EXPERIENCIA
I was pleasantly surprised how good the food was and the service was on point. I recommend this restaurant it you want authentic Dominican food. I will be back when I return to the city again üëç

Este lugar la primera vez que voy y no me gusto la comida muy cara la mesera que nos atendio muy distraida hasta se le olvido traerme lo que habia pedido!! Hay otros restaurants doninicanos que cosinan mejor y hasen mofongo tan bueno y no tan cara como la casa del mofongo!! Se creen que estan en la ciuda!!! Jaja

El mofongo con chicharr√≥n esta bueno solo que la ensalada parece de bolsa de supermercado
El pollo al grill estaba un poco seco y la ensalada igual nada fresca los frijoles si estaban buenos
Me parece caro el restaurante
Love eating here every time I go or pass through the city. Everything is delicious but I always order the same thing cause it's my favorite. Mofongo with the beef üòãü§§.
Food is so so so good best mofongo!!!!
Excelente ambiente para pasarla bien y compartir unos tragos y buen mofongo Dominicano
The place was very clean and the food came fast.
Excelente servicio de Mili, La comida estuvo magnifica y la m√∫sica tambi√©n. 100% recomiendo este lugar a cualquiera que desee una comida dominicana y un ambiente genial

When you‚Äôre in the Heights you just have to stop here.  Came for an early dinner. Seated almost immediately. Our server was attentive and very nice. We ordered a variety of different dishes. I actually tried the monfongo with chicharr√≥n. Pretty tasty. Very filling, I couldn‚Äôt finish the entire meal. We also had the chuletas, camarones al ajillo, churrasco and arroz con pollo. Overall great food.
Estuve  por este restaurant  y ordene  medio pollo con vegetales, excelente  comida y buena atenci√≥n

The food was very well prepared to temperature and taste. They tried to shape the rice on the plate, but it fell apart when it was served. That is probably the only negative thing I can say. All the food tasted great. Our waitress regularly checked in on my family. I appreciate her attentiveness to our wants and needs. She made it easy to enjoy our meal. The staff even packed our leftover food in front of us. They seemed to enjoy their employment there which was nice to see. The atmosphere was energetic and entertaining. They played all the jams anyone could dance to. My kids got up and started their own dance off on our way out. I would recommend this place for the food, service, and atmosphere.

Muy buena gastronom√≠a dominicana.
Se siente ese sabor de Quisqueya.

Food was incredible.
Portions are very generous!!!

Get the paella!!!!!!
Me gusta ir all√≠

Not my favorite but also not the worst place to eat Dominican food. The juice was not fresh (most likely from a store bought carton), my chicken tasted as if it had been reheated. I would rather go to a little hole in the wall further uptown or in the Bronx.

La comida es deliciosa y el servicio de primera. Sin embargo ese caf√© que sirven no parece que es un sitio dominicano y es car√≠simo. Fuimos dos adultos y una ni√±a, no le pedimos un servicio a la ni√±a, dos platos, dos entradas (las almejas y las croquetas de pollo son ricas) dos caf√©, trees jugos de chinola y una tres leche. Eso fue 188 d√≥lares.

Cada vez que viajo desde MA, tengo que venir a comer aqu√≠!

Positivo:
1. La comida es tan rica y deliciosa. Cada vez que vengo trato un plato distinto, pero asta ahora todo me a gustado mucho!
2. Las mecer√°s son tan amables y r√°pidas.
3. Los ba√±os est√°n limpios
4. El olor del restaurante es agradable y puedes disfrutar de las mesas y sillas limpias.
5. La localizaci√≥n est√° en el lugar correcto y puedes disfrutar de las tiendas alrededor.
6. Los precios son razonables para el tama√±o de la comida.

Negativo:
1.  Lo √∫nico que cambiar√≠a es el volumen de la m√∫sica.
2. Me siento inc√≥moda un hombre vendiendo perfumes cerca del ba√±o. Creo que hay lugar para todo.

Food was great, Good Vibe... Went here really late in the evening so everything was off a more expensive menu.. wish they had a better salad selection.  However other food was delicious..
If you like Hookah, they have that too on the bar side of the restaurant.  I do not smoke so Hookah is not for me. However,  ppl seems to really like that.

Did I mention Music, so you can totally dance here, there is not an actual dance floor however ppl made the best of it..

If you're in the mood for something Caribbean, both in food and culture this is the place. A loud, but not too loud, exciting atmosphere smiling faces, and plenty of flavor in the air. The music isn't so loud that you have to shout over people but it is definitely apparent.

The food is priced well, cooked with expertise. Reminds me of some of my grandmothers cooking, and takes that as a high compliment in full esteem. The drinks were also great, maybe too good.

Bring your family, listen to the music, sip your drink, and eat. A good time.

The food was phenomenal! The beans were made so well. The mofongo is seasoned well, soft texture, and the chibo was tender! Chicharron de pollo had so much flavor and was super juicy. The service was great. Wish they would get a heater downstairs where the bathrooms are. Also wish the bathrooms weren't all the way downstairs. Will be coming back anyway.

The music was waaaaaaayy too loud. Come on. It was insane. The food was ok nothing special. It was a little overpriced if you ask me especially for Dominican rice and beans . They had alot items missing from the menu, and when you asked why, the waiters just had a dumb look on their faces and no explanation. It's not difficult to answer a question about a menu item. Probably won't be coming back

This Dominican restaurant is a fantastic find! They offer a wide variety of mofongo dishes, perfect for meat lovers and vegetarians alike.  You can choose between dry or broth-style mofongo, and they have a great selection of other Dominican specialties.

The location is super convenient, with easy access by bus or subway. Plus, it's perfect for a relaxed meal with friends - they have spacious tables and are accessible for people with disabilities. They even offer take-out options if you're on the go.

Overall, highly recommend checking this place out!

Our server was super cool. We ordered Sangria and didn't like it too much and she up and returned the whole bottle free of charge. The food didn't last too long and it tasted awesome just have a look a some of my pictures...Negatives are‚Ä¶

This was a great budget friendly restaurant!If you want to experience the culture, it's the perfect spot for it. Walking around in the heights can build up an appetite, conveniently located right off the street of bustling vendors, you can't miss it! Food was awesome and plentiful, plantains are very filling and the portions are huge! Service is a little M.I.A but, the price makes up for it. Yes, your server speaks spanish and english!!
If Hookah and lurking older men at the bar makes you nervous...leave by 7pm.
Overall, I had a great meal..not too many vegan options so beware,stick to the sides part of the menu.

La comida tard√≥ mucho para llegar, m√°s de una hora. La mesera nunca se acerc√≥ a preguntarnos si quer√≠amos otra bebida. Mi esposo orden√≥ churrasco ‚Äúmedium well‚Äù y lleg√≥ ‚Äúwell done‚Äù, yo ordene mofongo con chicharr√≥n y el chicharr√≥n estaba muy seco.
The food was good, but the steak was too dry and overcooked for my liking.
Food is great! Service as well. Too busy on that day and food took some time, but overall pretty good. Especially the schrimp asopao. Loved it

Great restaurant that with great food!! Came here during a late rainy night where almost all restaurants around the area were closed except for this one. Best place I could have gone. The food was great and at a really good price! Great drinks menu and the staff was really nice!!

Great music, vibe, and hookah. They vary in hookah flavors. The dinner was great and reasonable price to be NY. Would recommend for anyone to come. *Only downfall is they lack on appetizer options; not many options.*

El lugar es bien familiar es un poco costoso el servicio es 100% la comida como el Mofongo con churrasco no me sorprendi√≥ creo que esperaba m√°s de el lugar solo por la fama que mis amistades le dieron
The staff was very knowledgeable and helpful, and the food was absolutely delicious! üëåüèª

My Fianc√© is half Dominican and he swears by this place as the best Dominican food in New York. We go whenever we find ourselves in Washington Heights. Best to go with someone who knows their way around the menu and speaks Spanish. The staff is nice, but many are not proficient English speakers. Don‚Äôt expect traditional American style service as you‚Äôre in the heart of the City‚Äôs Dominican neighborhood.

The food is hearty with rice, beans and plantains for sides. As typical with Dominican fare, the meats can be overcooked and dry, but also crispy, salty and satisfying.

I want to start off by saying one of the most flavorful foods I‚Äôve eaten in a while. I came here a few times and the food hit every time. The staff were super welcoming and friendly. The prices are reasonable. Will definitely be added to my collection of favorite cuisines.

Todo perfecto excepto que la m√∫sica del bar es muy alta y molesta en el √°rea de comida, no puedes concertar una reuni√≥n de negocios ah√≠ porque la m√∫sica no te dejar√≠a, deben dividir el espacio con un cristal  para que se pueda disfrutar en los dos lados .
I enjoyed the food, the drinks and the company. Thanks for having me.

Great atmosphere.  Great service.  Moderate wait times but worth it.  I had the chicharon mofongo it was excellent.  My husband had the seafood spaghetti in white sauce and it was delicious.  It had crab, lobster, calamari, octopus, and‚Ä¶

La comida es muy buena, pero el
Servicio malo , pedi unas alita de entrada y ni me la traeron , por eso nonlo recomiendo , el
Servicio va de la Mano con todo üò°

OMG...Everything was Deliciouso and the service was wonderful.  We ate like there was no tomorrow and had food to take home.  The cafe con leche and dolce de leche were magnificently.  I used to eat here years ago and was in NYC for the day‚Ä¶
La comida ten√≠a buen sabor pero estaba fr√≠a,  el servicio estuvo bien, pero creo que pueden mejorar el aspecto del lugar.
Food was decent. Nothing mind blowing. The service could have been a lot better‚Ä¶.not that friendly. Overall, I don‚Äôt think I would return.

This place was so dope. My friends & I loved it when we visited this Summer. The service was quite good from the hostess to our lovely server but the Mofongo was the best part. I got the beef steak one & my mouth waters just remembering it. Unfortunately they didn't have the deserts we wanted but we were so full anyways. Can't wait to go back.

Loved it . We had came down from Rhode Island to visit our home town and family üíïüíï. The food was excellent the ambience was excellent just love being around music and friends and family Latino culture. The food was amazing they have a variety for all that are looking for something different something new something tasty. The desserts üíú yum I had flan . Looking forward to my next visit or celebrate my birthday üéâüéâüéâ. I had the bento box üç± . üò± It was delicious. Japanese dish .
Es un restaurante que exalta la gastronom√≠a t√≠pica de la comida Dominicana en New York, sus precios son asequibles, y su men√∫ bien amplio, de muy buen sabor y saz√≥n.
